actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the act of October 20, 1976, relating to certain payments to local governmental units based upon public lands within the boundaries of such governmental units.

summary.text: Makes all units of local government in Alaska other than the borough which acts as the collecting and distributing agency for real property taxes eligible to receive payments from the Secretary of the Interior based upon the amount of public lands within the boundaries of such locality.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of October 20, 1976, relating to certain payments to local governmental units based upon public lands within the boundaries of such governmental units.
